actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to ensure an orderly transition to the new educational assistance program provided under chapter 106 of such title.
short_title: Selected Reserve Educational Assistance Program Amendments of 1985

summary.text: Selected Reserve Educational Assistance Program Amendments of 1985 - Amends the Federal provisions concerning educational assistance for members of the Selected Reserve of the armed forces to require such program to conform with the all-volunteer force educational assistance program enacted under the Veterans' Educational Assistance Act of 1984. Changes the effective date of eligibility for veterans' educational assistance to the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: Selected Reserve Educational Assistance Program Amendments of 1985
A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to ensure an orderly transition to the new educational assistance program provided under chapter 106 of such title.
